context: Insurance company evaluating expansion into cyber risk underwriting market with growing demand for cybersecurity coverage

request.purpose: Develop cyber risk underwriting capabilities and product portfolio
request.justification: Cyber attacks increased 300% in past 3 years with $8B annual market opportunity

decision_process.outcome: Identified $12B addressable market with 25% annual growth
Need for specialized cyber expertise and advanced analytics platform
Comprehensive product suite covering network, data, and operational risks
Successful pilot with 15% market share in test regions

business_impact.expected_outcome: New revenue stream generating $45M in annual premiums within 3 years

lessons_learned: Early investment in cyber expertise critical for market entry, continuous monitoring of threat landscape essential
